statements: SELECT * FROM company_financial_data WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT company_name, dividends FROM company_financial_data WHERE dividends > 1000;
SELECT * FROM company_financial_data WHERE market_cap BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000;
SELECT company_name, earnings FROM company_financial_data WHERE earnings IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM company_financial_data ORDER BY market_cap DESC, company_name ASC;
SELECT company_name, market_cap, dividends FROM company_financial_data WHERE earnings > 100000 ORDER BY market_cap DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_name, earnings, dividends, market_cap FROM company_financial_data WHERE dividends > 0 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM company_financial_data WHERE market_cap BETWEEN 1000000 AND 5000000 ORDER BY company_id ASC;
SELECT company_name, dividends, earnings FROM company_financial_data ORDER BY earnings DESC, dividends ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_id, company_name FROM company_financial_data WHERE earnings > dividends * 2 ORDER BY company_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE dividend_amount > 1000
SELECT company_name, dividend_amount FROM dividends ORDER BY dividend_amount DESC
SELECT company_name, ex_dividend_date FROM dividends WHERE record_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT company_name, earnings_amount, earning_date FROM earnings WHERE earnings_amount BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000
SELECT * FROM earnings ORDER BY primary_key
SELECT company_name, dividend_amount FROM dividends WHERE dividend_amount > 1000 ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE ex_dividend_date > '2022-01-01' AND record_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT company_name, SUM(dividend_amount) AS total_dividend FROM dividends GROUP BY company_name ORDER BY total_dividend DESC;
SELECT company_name, earning_date, earnings_amount FROM earnings WHERE earning_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY earning_date DESC, earnings_amount ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY company_name HAVING total_earnings > 1 ORDER BY total_earnings DESC, company_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE company_id = 1
SELECT company_id, dividend_amount FROM dividends WHERE record_date = '2021-08-15'
SELECT AVG(dividend_amount) AS avg_dividend FROM dividends
SELECT company_id, SUM(earnings_amount) AS total_earnings FROM earnings GROUP BY company_id
SELECT company_id, MAX(market_cap_amount) AS max_market_cap FROM market_cap WHERE market_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT company_id, dividend_amount, record_date FROM dividends WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY record_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT company_id, earnings_amount, report_date FROM earnings WHERE earnings_amount > 100000 ORDER BY earnings_amount DESC, report_date ASC;
SELECT company_id, market_cap_amount, market_date FROM market_cap WHERE market_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY market_cap_amount DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT DISTINCT company_id, dividend_amount FROM dividends WHERE record_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY company_id ASC, dividend_amount DESC;
SELECT company_id, SUM(dividend_amount) AS total_dividends FROM dividends GROUP BY company_id HAVING total_dividends > 50000 ORDER BY total_dividends DESC, company_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM dividends ORDER BY ex_dividend_date DESC;
SELECT company_id, amount FROM dividends WHERE company_id = 1001;
SELECT company_id, SUM(amount) AS total_dividends FROM dividends GROUP BY company_id HAVING total_dividends > 5000;
SELECT c.name, e.amount FROM company_info c JOIN earnings e ON c.company_id = e.company_id WHERE e.amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM market_cap WHERE market_cap > 1000000 ORDER BY last_updated ASC;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY amount DESC, ex_dividend_date ASC;
SELECT company_id, quarter, year, amount FROM earnings WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT company_id, name, sector FROM company_info WHERE sector = 'Technology' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT market_cap, last_updated FROM market_cap WHERE company_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE ex_dividend_date > '2022-01-01' AND amount > 500 ORDER BY ex_dividend_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE dividend_amount > 1000
SELECT company_id, earnings_amount FROM earnings WHERE earnings_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name DESC
SELECT company_id, market_cap_amount FROM market_cap WHERE market_cap_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT company_id, price FROM stock_prices WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM dividends WHERE company_id = 1 ORDER BY dividend_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT company_id, SUM(dividend_amount) AS total_dividend FROM dividends GROUP BY company_id;
SELECT company_name, SUM(earnings_amount) AS total_earnings FROM companies c JOIN earnings e ON c.company_id = e.company_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY company_name ASC;
SELECT company_id, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM stock_prices WHERE price_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' GROUP BY company_id HAVING avg_price > 1000;
